thread.title: Buffalo Is the NCAA Tournament’s Cinderella. Why Aren’t They the Buffalo?

author: Andrew Beaton
title: Buffalo Is the NCAA Tournament’s Cinderella. Why Aren’t They the Buffalo?
text:
No. 13 seed Buffalo knocking off No. 4 seed Arizona on Thursday night wasn’t your average NCAA tournament upset. It was a stampede of epic proportions. Arizona was a trendy Final Four pick until this 89-68 stomping that made it known to the rest of college basketball exactly what happens when you mess with the Buffalo Bulls.
But we know what you’re thinking now: Why isn’t Buffalo’s mascot the Buffalo?
It... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
